title: These 5 deep tech startups have become hot targets for investors - YourStory
content: These 5 deep tech startups have become hot targets for investors  YourStory
description: Deep tech startups, popular among investors, are expected to continue creating a huge impact in areas like AI (artificial intelligence), ML (machine learning), IoT (Internet of Things), AR/VR, big data, language processing, vision and speech algorithms, robotics and blockchain.
